title: Patch 6.24 and Disconnects
body:
For me personally I get the "failure to connect" prompt every single game since 6.24 release.
I then have to click "cancel" cause if I click "retry" it will repeat the error. Once I cancel I am
able to reconnect from the client.

It seems that I'm not the only one as in my games I have noticed a recent spike in Remakes
occurring. Please look into this!

replies.body:
Same here in Canada. The first game always connects fine. Every single future games, when the loading screen is supposed to come up, I get a "Failure to Connect".
I also have to click "Cancel" and "reconnect". "Retry" won't work. Happening since the last patch.

Don't forget to upvote so this receives attention! :)
same is happening to me but i never get the error message to click the cancel button. So im stuck looking at a reconnect button that just makes a noise and nothing more.

We're certainly looking into exactly what's causing this, but for now, we've added this issue to the In-Client ticker (next to Home button) and to the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) so players are aware of what's going on.

Let me know if you have any questions.
